mapper.select: select x.bk_category as "bk_category", x.bk_money as "bk_sum", (x.bk_money - y.bk_money) as "bk_minus", (x.bk_money - y.bk_money) / y.bk_money * 100 as "bk_compare" from (select d.bk_category, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, sum(d.bk_money) as bk_money from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on d.bk_num = b.bk_num where b.bk_month = month(now()) and d.id=#{loginID} group by d.bk_category, b.bk_year, b.bk_month) x left outer join (select d.bk_category, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, sum(d.bk_money) as bk_money from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on d.bk_num = b.bk_num where b.bk_month = month(now())-1 and d.id=#{loginID} group by d.bk_category, b.bk_year, b.bk_month) y on x.bk_category = y.bk_category;
